cast.original_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
cast.overview: Harry, Ron and Hermione walk away from their last year at Hogwarts to find and destroy the remaining Horcruxes, putting an end to Voldemort's bid for immortality. But with Harry's beloved Dumbledore dead and Voldemort's unscrupulous Death Eaters on the loose, the world is more dangerous than ever.
cast.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1

cast.original_title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die
cast.overview: In the wake of King Edward's death, Uhtred of Bebbanburg and his comrades adventure across a fractured kingdom in the hopes of uniting England at last.
cast.title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die

cast.overview: 15-year-old deep-thinking Welsh schoolboy Oliver Tate struggles to initiate and maintain a relationship with Jordana, his devilish, dark-haired classmate at their Swansea high school. As his parents' marriage begins to fall apart, similar problems arise in his relationship with Jordana.
cast.title: Submarine

cast.overview: An Amazon princess comes to the world of Man in the grips of the First World War to confront the forces of evil and bring an end to human conflict.
cast.title: Wonder Woman

cast.overview: The Blind Man has been hiding out for several years in an isolated cabin and has taken in and raised a young girl orphaned from a devastating house fire. Their quiet life together is shattered when a group of criminals kidnap the girl, forcing the Blind Man to leave his safe haven to save her.
cast.title: Don't Breathe 2

details.biography:
The Welsh actor Steffan Rhodri was born and raised in Morriston, Swansea, Wales. He is best known for his work in the films "Submarine"(2010); "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1" (2010); "Ironclad" (2011) and "Under Milk Wood" (2015).

On television he portrayed Dave Coaches in "Gavin and Stacey".
details.name: Steffan Rhodri
